root.message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 6-6-1b, translated into all languages

languages.language: The international standard classification being used is the Ramsar Classification System for Wetland Types, adopted at COP4 in 1990, and amended at COP6 in 1996 (Resolution VI.5) and at COP7 in 1999 (Resolution VII.11) which is a basic internationally applicable habitat description for sites designated for the Ramsar List of Wetlands of International Importance and other wetlands. See item 7 Annex 1 for the full classification.
